verses.verse: King<WH4428> Ahasuerus<WH325> laid<WH7760> a tribute<WH4522> on the land,<WH776> and on the islands<WH339> of the sea.<WH3220>

All the acts<WH4639> of his power<WH8633> and of his might,<WH1369> and the full account<WH6575> of the greatness<WH1420> of Mordecai,<WH4782> to which the king<WH4428> advanced<WH1431> him,<WH3789> aren't they written in the book<WH5612> of the chronicles<WH1697> of the kings<WH4428> of Media<WH4074> and Persia?<WH6539>

For Mordecai<WH4782> the Jew<WH3064> was next<WH4932> to King<WH4428> Ahasuerus,<WH325> and great<WH1419> among the Jews,<WH3064> and accepted<WH7521> by the multitude<WH7230> of his brothers,<WH251> seeking<WH1875> the good<WH2896> of his people,<WH5971> and speaking<WH1696> peace<WH7965> to all his descendants.<WH2233>
